summary: Captain Marvel First Look Now Playing in Theaters
title: Captain Marvel First Look Now Playing in Theaters
body:
A Noovie First Look at Marvel’s Captain Marvel has begun playing in theaters. This is one of those behind-the-scenes things that plays during the ads prior to the trailers in many theaters. Chains such as Cinemark and AMC run the Noovie packages, so if you go to one of those theaters around now you may see this.

There’s a lot of new behind-the-scenes footage in the piece, including interviews…

View On WordPress

summary: Amazon.com: Battle on the Moon! (Marvel Avengers) (Little Golden Book) eBook: John Sazaklis, Penelope R. Gaylord: Kindle Store
body:
Amazon.com: Battle on the Moon! (Marvel Avengers) (Little Golden Book) eBook: John Sazaklis, Penelope R. Gaylord: Kindle Store

Description

Captain Marvel and the Mighty Avengers team up to save Earth in this all-new action-packed Little Golden Book!


Captain Marvel responds to the call when an out-of-this-world villain threatens, and the hero teams up with her allies, the mighty Avengers, to save the day. This book is perfect for girls and boys ages 2 to 5, as well as Marvel fans and collectors of all ages!

summary: Lucca Comics and Games 2018, Day 2 - Cosplay (22 of 41)  Done with this year’s exhibits, I head back to the city centre, where...
caption:
Lucca Comics and Games 2018, Day 2 - Cosplay (22 of 41)

Done with this year’s exhibits, I head back to the city centre, where the late-morning sun has brought more cosplay out to play.

The guys cosplaying as Monopoly (like, literally the game) were definitely a highlight of this year’s edition.

reblog.comment:

title: Disney's 2019 Theatrical Takeover
body:
Disney’s 2019 Theatrical Takeover

Disney is pretty much set to make box office history in 2019. With an impressive lineup of sequels, live-action remakes, and first-time debuts, the Walt Disney Company is sure to have one of the most profitable years yet. See below for a list of must-see Disney films in 2019 along with their release dates.

Captain Marvel – March 8

title: Future Favorites, 2019 Edition
body:
Future Favorites, 2019 Edition

It’s so very close to the end of 2018! We are packing away the year, clearing the debris, and preparing for the coming of 2019! May it be an excellent year in all things speculative fiction! We are looking ahead at the year to come, and we cannot help but get excited about what kinds of media will be coming forth for our eager consumption. Movies! Games! Books! Television! We are filled to the…

summary: Si infittisce il mistero sul ruolo di Jude Law in Captain Marvel
title: Si infittisce il mistero sul ruolo di Jude Law in Captain Marvel
body:
Si infittisce il mistero sul ruolo di Jude Law in Captain Marvel

Il ruolo di Jude Law in Captain Marvel potrebbe non essere quello di Mar-Vell. Il giorno dopo la conferma proveniente direttamente da casa Disney, arriva oggi una sorta di smentita.

Facciamo un passo indietro. Sin dall’ingaggio di Jude Law, i Marvel Studios hanno cercato di tenere il maggior riserbo riguardo quello che poi sarebbe stato il ruolo del divo in Captain Marvel. Nei mesi scorsi, in…

View On WordPress

blog.name: demigodofhoolemere
blog.title: all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others
blog.description: Karisa. Member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. Multi-fandom mess, mood often shifts. Entirely too much in love with all manner of shows, movies, and books. Sam Winchester is my lifeblood. Ravenclaw scatterbrain. INFP. ADHD & autistic. Synesthesia & insomnia wrapped in a chronic headache. Big anxious nerd. Have a lovely day! :)

tags: how do they expect me to trust anything they say when they pull stuff like this
please just let me know how to tag this man
like... mar vell is too important to carol's origin for it to /not/ be him and i've been saying that from the start
but boy do they know how to confuse the crud out of me
and after the whole 'it’s not called endgame' 'oh wait it’s actually called endgame' thing... i can rely on nothing
summary: Marvel: Jude Law has been cast as Mar-Vell! Marvel: but actually he might not be Marvel: just kidding of course it’s Mar-Vell...
body:
Marvel: Jude Law has been cast as Mar-Vell!

Marvel: but actually he might not be

Marvel: just kidding of course it’s Mar-Vell

Marvel: plot twist he’s Yon-Rogg and all of you were wrong haha psych

Marvel: *lists him as Mar-Vell on an official Disney page*

Marvel: *quickly edits it to call him Leader of the Starforce rather than letting him have any name at all now*

me: ???!!!???!!!???!!!

reblog.comment:

Marvel: *lists him as Mar-Vell on an official Disney page*

Marvel: *quickly edits it to call him Leader of the Starforce rather than letting him have any name at all now*

me: ???!!!???!!!???!!!

me: ???!!!???!!!???!!!
